name: NCT03421379_secondaryOutcomeMeasure_3_OG000
title: PK: Change From Baseline in Maximal Concentration (Cmax) of Glucagon Nasal Powder and Glucagon Hydrochloride IM at Pre-dose, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, 30, 40, 50, 60, 90, 120, 240 minutes after each glucagon administration for Glucagon Nasal Powder in NCT03421379

note.text: Outcome Measure Population Description: All randomized participants who received at least one dose of study drug and had evaluable PK data.

observed.display: A single dose of 3 mg glucagon nasal powder was administered intranasally
